name: Frugal Tommy
description:
Classic Commando-like shooting, with a little economy and tactics involved.

Eliminate enemy threat by a min. of 60 % (on sci-fi levels: 80 %) and destroy outpost(s) to clear an area, then find the Evacuation point to go on rampaging to the next level.

Don't neglect your purse: collect coins remaining on the battlefield, to be able to upgrade your weapon arsenal.

As the levels are quite large, a Minimap will appear - if u stand idle - and show you all Points of Interest.

Sometimes better to wait for the daylight when endeavouring into unknown regions.

Features
  • day-night cycle
  • weather system (rain, snow)
  • light "Line of Sight" system: hide behind obstacles
  • mod-able weapons
  • stamina system
  • destructible terrain
  • mini-map
  • aim-easing for quick action
  • battle impacted sick statuses /dizzy, injured/
  • 3 usable firearms / Assault rifle, Shotgun, Laser /
  • a quite realistic gun clip management and loading system
  • enemy outpost "sieges"
  • nature and sci-fi environments, in altogether 10 levels
Controls Gamepad

  • movement
  • shoot : B1
  • grenade : B4
  • weapon next : B2
  • weapon prev.: B3

Keyboard
  • movement : cursor keys / WASD
  • shoot : Space
  • grenade : CTRL/ X / L
  • weapon next : Enter / E
  • weapon prev.: Del / Q
